TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Gapone said:
> 
> 
> Why only one? On Terraria forums there are 20 namechanges. And they're done without requesting! But in ACCOUNT SETTINGS!
> 

As we've said before, we don't want people to misbehave and escape responsibility by confusing others about their names, and also because I'm the only one with the permissions to make the changes and I have a day job and other stuff to do, so I don't have time to be changing names over and over.

> 
> 
> 6 hours ago, Vanamonde said:
> 
> 
> As we've said before, we don't want people to misbehave and escape responsibility by confusing others about their names, and also because I'm the only one with the permissions to make the changes and I have a day job and other stuff to do, so I don't have time to be changing names over and over.
> 

If you wanted to, could you change everyone's name and profile picture to the same thing and then change them back, like as an April Fools joke or something? Without manually doing it to every single user, of course...

> 
> 
> 23 minutes ago, Ultimate Steve said:
> 
> 
> If you wanted to, could you change everyone's name and profile picture to the same thing and then change them back, like as an April Fools joke or something? Without manually doing it to every single user, of course...
> 

Nope, that would have to be done one by one.

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Vanamonde said:
> 
> 
> Nope, that would have to be done one by one.
> 

Well I guess if you're not dedicated to your job or something.

Is there a way to make your name change more than once?

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, EdwardB3020﻿ said:
> 
> 
> Is there a way to make your name change more than once?
> 

No, because we have decided not to allow that, as a matter of forum policy.  Otherwise people would be changing their names all over the place and it would be hard for everyone (including moderators) to keep mental track of who's who.  That's why this thread says "WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!" loudly, right there in the forum title.  ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")
A long time ago, I tried to make another forum account. The accounts were merged, and the newer name overwrote the old one. Would it be possible to change my username back to cy4n?

> 
> 
> 4 hours ago, Osmium said:
> 
> 
> A long time ago, I tried to make another forum account. The accounts were merged, and the newer name overwrote the old one. Would it be possible to change my username back to cy4n?
> 

You sure you want this? We can't be changing people's names back and forth multiple times.

> 
> 
> 2 minutes ago, Vanamonde said:
> 
> 
> You sure you want this? We can't be changing people's names back and forth multiple times.
> 

Absolutely.

> 
> 
> 9 minutes ago, Osmium said:
> 
> 
> Absolutely.

Done.
